column1: Calling hours for Father Kelly will be on Thursday
column3: 2015 from 4 to 7 p.m. at the McNulty Funeral Home
column5: Green Island. The Funeral Liturgy will be celebrated on Friday
column7: 2015 at Immaculate Heart of Mary Church in Watervliet at 11:00 a.m. with The Most Reverend Edward B. Scharfenberger
column9: Bishop of Albany as the principal celebrant. Burial with full military honors will take place on Monday
